data.title: What is Cherylâ€™s surname now? From Tweedy to Cole to Fernandez-Versini
data.meta_description: IT has been hard to keep up with Cheryl's last name in the past after the singer changed it when she married, now going by her first name as a mononym
data.text:
IT has been hard to keep up with Cheryl's last name in the past after the singer changed it when she married, now going by her first name as a mononym.

So what is her surname now and how did she dated?

What is Cheryl's surname now?

Cheryl took her maiden name Tweedy back after the birth of her son Bear.

She started dating One Direction star Liam at the beginning of 2016.

However, on July 1, 2018, The Sun exclusively revealed that Cheryl and Liam had separated after two-and-a-half years together.

The pair released a statement confirming their split: "We are sad to announce that we are going our separate ways.

"It's been a tough decision for us to make. We still have so much love for each other as a family.

"Bear is our world and we ask that you respect his privacy as we navigate our way through this together."

How old is Cheryl?

As of June 2023, Cheryl is 40 years old.

She is born on June 30, 1983, in Newcastle upon Tyne.

In 2002 when Cheryl joined Girls Aloud , alongside Nadine Coyle, Sarah Harding, Nicola Roberts and Kimberley Walsh,she was known as Cheryl Tweedy.

Who has Cheryl dated?

Cheryl dated and married footballer Ashley Cole.

Following the marriage she changed her name to Cheryl Cole.

During her marriage with Cole, Girls Aloud were at the height of their career, being awarded Most Consecutive Top 10 Entries in the UK by a Female Group and Most Successful Reality TV Group by the Guinness World Records.

In 2010, Cheryl announced she would be separating from the footballer, and filed for divorce, citing 'unreasonable behaviour'.

She continued to use her name for a number of years before dropping the Cole for just Cheryl when releasing new solo material.

Despite the failed relationship, Cheryl kept the name, until she met and married Jean-Bernard Fernandez-Versini in 2014.

However, their 18-month marriage was not meant to be, with the pair splitting in December 2015.

Following their divorce Jean Bernard accused the Geordie star of trying to ruin his name and force him out of the country.

She dated One Direction singer Liam Payne in 2016 and gave birth to their son Bear in 2017.

After the break up with Liam Payne, Cheryl decided to go full circle and legally change her name back to Tweedy.

As of June 2023, Cheryl is not dating anyone.

How many children does Cheryl have?

Cheryl has one child, called Bear.

She had him in March 2017, while she still was in a relationship with Liam Payne.
